label: Ugrad Bioinformatics Seminar
description: Introduces the field of bioinformatics and computational biology. Same as CPSC 491 and LIS 483. No graduate credit. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in separate terms to maximum of 2 undergraduate hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: Same as CPSC 491 and LIS 483. No graduate credit. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in separate terms to maximum of 2 undergraduate hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
